name: CLARITY_EMP
description: This table contains high-level information about user records from the User master file.

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID assigned to the user record. This ID may be encrypted.

columns.name: USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.

columns.name: NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
